de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.explanations

Class Explanation<S>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.fm.core.explanations.Explanation<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - subject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeatureModelExplanation

    public abstract class Explanation<S>
extends java.lang.Object
    Data class holding the explanation for a circumstance such as a defect in a feature model. Instances of this class are generated by ExplanationCreator.
    Author:
    Timo Günther, Sofia Ananieva

    • Method Summary

      Adds all given reasons to this explanation.

      Adds the given reason to this explanation if it is not already contained.

      Adds all of the given reasons to this explanation that are not already contained.

      Returns how many explanations have been generated and rolled into one for this explanation.

      • getSubject

        public S getSubject()
        Returns the subject of this explanation. That is the object with an attribute to be explained.
        Returns:
        the subject of this explanation

      • addReason

        public void addReason(Reason<?> reason)
        Adds the given reason to this explanation. Also increments its occurrence count.
        Parameters:
        reason - reason to add

      • addUniqueReasons

        public void addUniqueReasons(java.util.Collection<Reason<?>> reasons)
        Adds all of the given reasons to this explanation that are not already contained.
        Parameters:
        reasons - reasons to add

      • addUniqueReason

        public void addUniqueReason(Reason<?> reason)
        Adds the given reason to this explanation if it is not already contained.
        Parameters:
        reason - reason to add

      • addExplanation

        public void addExplanation(Explanation<? extends S> explanation)
        Adds all the reasons from the given explanation with their correct occurrence count to this explanation. Also sums up the explanation counts.
        Parameters:
        explanation - explanation to add to this one

      • setCounts

        public void setCounts(Explanation<? extends S> explanation)
        Sets the reason and explanation counts to the ones in the given explanation. The reasons themselves are not copied, thus maintaining the logical validity of this explanation.
        Parameters:
        explanation - explanation with reason and explanation counts to copy

      • getWriter

        public abstract ExplanationWriter<? extends Explanation<S>> getWriter()
        Returns an instance of ExplanationWriter suitable for this explanation.
        Returns:
        an instance of ExplanationWriter suitable for this explanation

      • toNode

        public Node toNode()
        Returns this explanation as a propositional formula.
        Returns:
        this explanation as a propositional formula

      • getImplication

        public abstract Node getImplication()
        Returns the formula that is implied logically by this explanation. For example, if this is an explanation for a false-optional feature, the implication is that the feature's parent implies the feature.
        Returns:
        the implication

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
